structure.unit: CLASSIFICATION AND DESIGNATION OF OFFENSES -- AUTHORIZED DISPOSITION

law.text:
A sentence of imprisonment for a misdemeanor shall be a definite term and shall be fixed within the following maximum limitations:
For a Class A misdemeanor, the term shall not exceed twelve (12) months; and
For a Class B misdemeanor, the term shall not exceed ninety (90) days.
law.history: Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 406, sec. 281, effective January 1, 1975.
